Package ca.teamTen.recitopia

Interface Summary
RecipeBook RecipeBook stores a set of recipes, allowing for persistence and querying.
 

Class Summary
ApplicationManager Singleton class for managing shared/heavy resources.
CloudRecipeBook RecipeBook interface to ElasticSearch recipe service.
FavoriteRecipe A collection of recipes which the user has saved for offline access.
Fridge Fridge class stores a set of ingredients, loads/saves from a file.
FridgeActivity An activity that allows the user to add/edit/remove ingredients from their fridge
IngredientAdapter The IngredientAdapter handles inflating the layout of ingredients within the FridgeActivity and RecipeEditActivity classes.
LocalCache This class stores a limited number of recipes that are not created by current user
MainActivity Launch activity, lets the user launch different activites.
Photo Stores a Photo and handles encoding/scaling/etc.
Recipe A Recipe with a name, ingredients, instructions, photos and an author.
RecipeBookBase Implements common routines for RecipeBook implementers.
RecipeEditActivity This activity loads or creates an activity when launched.
RecipeListActivity Displays a list of recipes.
RecipeViewActivity Displays a simple view of a recipe.
SearchActivity Basic searching activity.
TakePhotoActivity Assists the user in taking and reviewing pictures which will be attached to a Recipe.
UserRecipeBook RecipeBook that stores the user's own recipes, whether they are published or unpublished.
